comments: This had to be the worst class I\'ve ever taken. She just turns on episodes of dukes of melrose and graded us on what u remember from the episode. I got a C in the class cuz i was tired of watching that stupid show and stopped showing up. If you want an EASY class TAKE THIS CLASS. If you want a quality education and learn FONT TAKE THIS CLASS.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: She is awesome I never miss a class because i never wanted to miss on the fashion shows she would show. She has candy for her students which is cool and also the class is very easy and you have fun and learned. We had lancome cosmetics ans it was fun. Also you have two trends boards to do which are fun and easy. Take her you will like it and enjoy.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: She is the sweetest! Loved being in her classes, I\'ve taken 3 of her courses this past year! Makes learning about fashion so much fun! Expect to fill out worksheets and notes (which she provides)! There were two group display projects and one solo project! The final was very easy and the end of solo semester project was fun to do (fashion binder)

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: LOVED this class and the professor! Leslie is so sweet and she makes learning about fashion fun. We worked on class assignments as a class and we could work in groups on every test. This was an easy class! I recommend to take every class Leslie teaches!!

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: She is the best!!! Loved her class!! Had so much fun!! I\'d take any class she had to offer!

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: I loved this class!!! Definitely taking her other classes even if I have to wake up at 5:30 to be there by 7! She\'s so involved and knowledgeable in her field!

comments: Mrs. Bush is a very good teacher in every way. she explains everything clearly. she is also very understanding and very helpful. i have taken every class she teaches and have loved every one!
